data.text: Awurade asɛm a ɛbaa Petuel babarima Yoɛl so nie.
Montie saa asɛm yi, mo mpanimfoɔ;
Monka nkyerɛ mo mma,
Deɛ ntutummɛ kuo no gyaeɛ no
Mo asabofoɔ, monyane, na monsu!
Ɔman bi atu mʼasase so sa
Wɔasɛe me bobe
Di awerɛhoɔ sɛ ababaawa a ɔfira ayitoma
Aduane ne ahwiesa afɔrebɔdeɛ,
Mfuo asɛe,
Mo ani nwu, mo akuafoɔ,
Bobe no akusa
Momfira ayitoma na monni awerɛhoɔ, Ao asɔfoɔ;
Mommɔ mmuadadie kronkron ho dawuro;
Ɛda no aba!
Yɛnnhunuu sɛ aduane ho ayɛ na,
Aba no wu wɔ asase wesee mu,
Sɛdeɛ anantwie su!
Awurade, wo na mesu frɛ wo,
Wiram mmoa mpo pere hwehwɛ wo.
